channel.title: Digital services on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Digital services on FinanClub

item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:87 Chances: Comcast Corp.’s expansion into internet-based services and smart TV technology with Sky Stream and Sky Glass could provide significant growth opportunities in the digital services market. The addition of new theme park lands and the growth of Peacock streaming service indicate diversification and potential for increased revenue streams.

item.title: HIMS
item.description: score:108 Chances: Hims & Hers Health, Inc. unveiled Weight Loss by Hims & Hers, a comprehensive and customizable clinical approach specifically designed to help people achieve their individual weight-loss goals. The company has appointed Craig Primack, a pioneer in the field of clinical obesity medicine, as SVP of Weight Management, indicating a strong focus on addressing the growing issue of obesity.
